rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 19 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 5:45 PM, 07 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Bataan, Bulacan, Rizal, Laguna, Metro Manila, Cavite and Batangas within the next 2 hours.



Intense to torrential rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Pampanga(Mabalacat, Porac), Tarlac(Bamban, San Jose, Capas, Tarlac City, Victoria, Pura, Gerona), Nueva Ecija(Guimba, Licab, Quezon, Santo Domingo, Munoz, Talavera, Aliaga) and Quezon(San Narciso, San Francisco, San Andres, Mulanay, Catanauan, General Luna) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
